---
title: "About"
---

This is a brand colors example:

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(brand.yml)
library(quarto)

brand <- read_brand_yml("_brand.yml")
brand_theme <- theme_brand_ggplot2("_brand.yml")

ggplot(mpg, aes(x = displ, y = hwy, color = drv)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
  scale_color_manual(
    values = c(
      brand$color$palette$red,
      brand$color$palette$teal,
      brand$color$palette$orange
    )
  ) +
  labs(title = "A plot with brand colors") +
  brand_theme

```
